website_summaries.verdict: An ideal option for families, especially for those with younger children; this is a fun, fast-moving game.
pros: Trivia lovers with families rave about this game, giving it top marks for how entertaining and fun it is
A top pick for a family game night, particularly for families with younger children, this game also stands out for its good quality and attractive artwork
It's also an ideal choice for Disney fans of all ages
cons: some felt questions were too simple

customer_reviews.title: Good game spoiled by corner-cutting by manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great game if the trivia cards were larger. They print four pictures (screen grabs from the 9 HP universe movies) on each card, but they are each only about 1 inch diagonal in size. I have pretty good vision, but I have a hard time identifying some of the scenes depicted. The manufacturer seemed to "cheap out" on these to save about a penny per card. I also have the Disney Pictopia game, which we enjoy (really the only reason I bought this Harry Potter edition). The Disney version's cards are larger and easier to see and read.
customer_reviews.author: IronSights30

customer_reviews.title: Too Easy
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely geared toward younger children. My Disney fanatic teens found the questions way too easy. (i.e.) There are four pictures showing transportation (three ground transportation and one air transportation such as the Up house with balloons). The question asks which one is not a way to get around on the ground. Some of the questions, you don't even need to know Disney. Others are tougher. Bottom line: if you're a true Disney fan, this game isn't challenging enough. If, however, you don't know too much about Disney, it's a great game.
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: Really cool game have Disney pictopia so decided to give this ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cool game we have the Disney pictopia so decided to give this one a try since my daughter is a Harry Potter fan wasn’t sure if to get it because it says it includes fantastic beast and she’s not a fan but I went at bought it anyways I’m so glad i did because it only comes with about 10 question cards of the Fantastic beast and what we did is just tie them with a band and put them to the side so we know not to grab those 💫
customer_reviews.author: Diana Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Mom dad and kids are all huge Harry Potter fans and they loved it. They played a game after dinner
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift yesterday to my daughter and her family. They have a 9 yr old and a 13 year old. Mom dad and kids are all huge Harry Potter fans and they loved it. They played a game after dinner. If you don't know a lot about Harry Potter, you'd be lost.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This game was a disappointment. We hoped it would be fun for our family ranging in age from 7 to adults. Game play is too complex for the 7 year old but too boring for the older kids and adults. In addition, the app that is discussed in the description can not be accessed because the developer has not updated the app.
customer_reviews.author: mom2wke

customer_reviews.title: Family Night Favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this family game. We keep the instructions nearby in case we forget which question to read during play. Takes a little effort to learn to play according to the directions, but it's really not difficult. Every time we have a Family Game Night this game is a big hit and one of our favorites for sure. We totally thought we would ace every questions since we are all Disney buffs, but found out during the first time we played it that there is so much more that we don't know...lol. Our family loves this game. Definitely recommend this game for those that love Disney and Disney movie trivia!
customer_reviews.author: T. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Not Trivial Pursuit
customer_reviews.text: This is not for anyone who wants a game, it's more of a granola bonding kumbyah game. Everyone wins, no losers. It would be good for little kids except they probably wouldn't get older disney references...I expected an all ages trivial pursuit type game but if your looking for some bonding time with the kids (who don't care about winning/ages are not competitive ) then it would be 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy for my family
customer_reviews.text: My daughters, 6 and 15, both recently became big Harry Potter fans. We read all the books then watched all the movies. I thought it would be fun to find a game we could all play that was HP themed. It was a bit more challenging than I initially thought because a lot of the games are geared for older kids so my 6 yr old wouldn't have been able to participate. I finally found this one and it is perfect. It is based on your knowledge of the movies, so, for a 6 year old who has watched the movies multiple times, it is very doable. My whole family enjoyed playing and plan to play again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Casey

customer_reviews.title: Fun family game
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun family game. We play as parent/child teams with our 3 and 5 year old since there is a lot of reading. Many of the questions are easy enough for my three year old to get, but some are still challenging for my husband and I.
customer_reviews.author: LisaNunz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: We have only tried playing this game once so far. It arrived on time, exactly as pictured and described. Just not sure about the directions. We might need to re-watch a few movies and re read the rules before playing again. Definitely not for a beginning Harry Potter fan.
customer_reviews.author: Joelann

customer_reviews.title: Must have for family game night.
customer_reviews.text: Fast and excellent service. I own the Disney edition and when I saw the Harry Potter edition, I just had to have it. Can’t wait till game night.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to purchase this for Christmas especially since it had been sold out last year. Turns out it’s a pretty dumb game and extremely boring. Played one time and put it away. Definitely not a 2 player game. We are huge Harry Potter fans but not of this game. I would return but it’s too big of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: FLBeachmom

customer_reviews.title: Family friendly
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old got this for her birthday, she just started reading a few months ago... she was able to play with a bit of a struggle the first time or 2, but now she loves it! The entire family enjoys playing it and aside from a few older movies (that can be streamed now anyway), he adults really don’t have much of an upper hand. We enjoy playing this game and the board never goes flying. Definitely a 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great fun family Disney Game!
customer_reviews.text: Really great game for family and Disney fans. My kids all love it and can play, ages 3, 7, and almost 9. Even my non Disney fan husband had fun! I really like this brand. Every puzzle and now game I ever bought from Ravensburger (sp?) has been top quality. Note: if you even lost 1 piece you can not play anymore. My kids are not allowed to play unsupervised because of this! They always loose game pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend it enough
customer_reviews.text: The game is original and accommodates novices or skilled Potterheads. Can't recommend it enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good game for family
customer_reviews.text: A four star review might be too harsh for this game. But helpful guide for you Pro: easy to play, good for most ages, helpful if you can read so younger kids may struggle. Con for me: too easy, too quick but that might be a pro for some. You need to see the pictures to "vote" but questions on the backside of picture card. We just did the honor system when playing Otherwise great cooperative and easy game
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Our family has played this several times already amd we love it. The game is high quality. It has a lot of variety so the game will never be the same twice. Highly recommend for Harry Potter fans.
customer_reviews.author: Laural Janke

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for avid Harry Potter fans!
customer_reviews.text: This game is lots of fun for a Harry Potter fan. My 11 year old child enjoyed playing and we were able to have a great discussion about book versus movie. Parents be aware that if it’s been a while since you have seen the movies, your memory will fail you! Great fun for the family!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher5

customer_reviews.title: Great for whole family
customer_reviews.text: Great value, easy to play and so much fun for the whole family. My family (still at home) consist of Mom, Dad, 13 yr old G, 17 yr old G....we all played this together and then played again as teams and had so much fun. Even learned somethings I didn't know. This game makes for lots of fun happy memories.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Disney fans
customer_reviews.text: Fun gift for the family to play. Variety of questions. Some are hard enough for older people and then their are easier ones for kids. My 5 year old and 8 year old Disney fans really enjoy this game.
customer_reviews.author: alex spencer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for any Disney fan
customer_reviews.text: Our entire family loves playing this game. It would be a bit difficult if you knew nothing about Disney since questions relate to images on the cards. The instructions seem complicated at first, especially to our 7-year-old. However, after we played a game while carefully referring to the instructions, it made more sense. Good supply of cards that we have not gotten through yet even through we have played this game several times.
customer_reviews.author: K. HOWE

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for potter fans
customer_reviews.text: With a home full of Harry Potter fans we had to try this one and had a fun time. Lots of trivia, lots of questions you answer together as a group as well as individually. Time frame isn't too long, just an hour or less. So much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast play
customer_reviews.text: Quick game, easy to play, easy to learn. We had a great time playing it our first time, no confusing directions. 10yr old and 8yr old both enjoyed it and could answer the questions. Based on the movies, not the books.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: I took this game into the classroom to break up test review. The kids loved it and the variety of movies and shows made it easy for everyone to participate. They level of questions was great, so I could adapt the game. The about me category was great too. They ask to play it an indoor recess, too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Holloway

customer_reviews.title: such a fun game
customer_reviews.text: this is a great game and is easier to learn then the directions seem and you can easily have house rules added to make it easier still great game and the value of the pieces and the cards is great i have won a few times and the card pieces are great and vivid a must have for any potter head like me +50 pts house slytherin
customer_reviews.author: torontodrake 30

customer_reviews.title: Magical Fun for the Whole Family!
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family loves this game! It is easily adapted for kids who can’t read yet, but you would need to have seen all the movies or it would. It be as enjoyable. Love the teamwork and the fact that more than one person can win!
customer_reviews.author: Tambra Isenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great disney trivia for grade school kids
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old is trivia obsessed. This is a great disney trivia game for kids. Honestly we havent played the game and just use the cards to play trivia but have tons of fun with them. We have learned new facts and it is fun to have pictures to go with the questions.
customer_reviews.author: turtley78

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9-year-old who was having an HP-themed birthday this year and we have had tons of fun playing this game. Challenging enough for grown-ups, but easy enough for him to have a chance to win.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Williams

customer_reviews.title: ... game that kids and adults in my family actually enjoy playing together
customer_reviews.text: A game that kids and adults in my family actually enjoy playing together. It's been fun for everyone. Some questions are easier for the younger generation who grew up on Pixar, while other questions are about the older movies. I like how much teamwork is involved, because everyone can use their individual strengths to come up with correct group answers.
customer_reviews.author: mr. cotter

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Lots of fun playing with my 7 and 5 year old. They don't know a lot of the early Disney stuff, but it's still fun. There are Disney parks questions, but you can just skip them or guess. We play the group questions just as individual ones to make it a little harder. It goes quickly, and it's a game I don't mind playing over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: KPIrish

customer_reviews.title: Exciting for my granddaughter who loves Harry Potter
customer_reviews.text: I tried playing it with my ten year old granddaughter. And it seemed boring. But when we played it with her parents and uncle it was exciting. They knew the characters and movie information.
customer_reviews.author: dawn l.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Harry Potter fans!
customer_reviews.text: Being a family full of Harry Potter fans, we enjoy playing this game together on our family game nights! It is totally fun to play with the kiddos since you get to work together as a team throughout most of the game!
customer_reviews.author: AliCat

customer_reviews.title: Colorful contents + easy-to-follow directions
customer_reviews.text: The contents of the game are very colorful, and the directions are easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Swidor

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, wish for a bigger board.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to little girls, and their family on Christmas morning. We all really enjoyed playing. Thought I knew Disney, nope the kids beat me! All I wish is that the board itself was larger. There were 4 of us playing and sometimes a number of us might land on the same square and there simply was not enough space. A bigger boards would be easier to see too. But a really fun board game for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Great for those true Harry Potter fans
customer_reviews.text: If you or your kids/friends are fans of Harry Potter this game is great. We learned some new facts and found out how much we actually knew. I love this game.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Family fun!
customer_reviews.text: So fun! I bought this as a family game. Most questions are pretty easy if you know your disney movies and characters. But some are more about the disney parks and more interesting trivia. My kids didnt understand the water part, so we didnt play that way. Maybe in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Aliese Salmond

customer_reviews.title: Let you know more
customer_reviews.text: Waiting for family to play. They are do to visit at the end of august
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn M Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Collectible so not opening
customer_reviews.text: I have every game ever made for HP fans. Nine open so don’t ask questions. Passing on to grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Barry B. Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Game for older kids
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 6 years old daughter as she loves Disney movies. Te questions are hard for her and she doesn’t know all those movies as some of them are old... Maybe better for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Different way to do trivia - uses pictures from scenes in the movies. Lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game for the family
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sisters family and they said they absolutely love it! If you have younger kids, someone may need to read the cards to them, but other than that, it’s a cute little game! They have definitely got their money’s worth out of it already!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: We liked it but thought most questions were easy. We had expected it to be harder
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Awesome family fun!!
customer_reviews.text: I do not write many reviews, but I had to on this one. We love this game!! My husband, 7 year old daughter, and I played for hours on Christmas night. We would finish one game and immediately start a new one. We even played again the following day. It's great family fun. We love the collaboration aspect and the wagering of spaces. The questions are not too difficult, but still challenging. If you are thinking of purchasing this game, go ahead and do it. You will enjoy it!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Balwanz

customer_reviews.title: fun family game...
customer_reviews.text: something for everyone, didn't know some of the new Disney shows but was fun for everyone
customer_reviews.author: Jill R Hays

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This game was very fun & my 7 year old caught on quickly. It was fun for her and the adults during Christmas. Nice job 🎅
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I received air tight food container storage instead
customer_reviews.text: I've been sick and out of work so just opened my package. When I did, I discovered I received an air tight storage container system instead. Could someone please send me my game?
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Youngest of Three
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece for Christmas. I haven't talked to her since then but she was pretty impressed on Christmas day. She won't be 5 til February but she's pretty bright and she has two older brothers. I wanted to get something that the boys might actually play with her and I think this fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Bold & Beautiful

customer_reviews.title: my sons were 8 and 10 when I got this for them and it was just too easy. I love disney
customer_reviews.text: It could be my own fault for the lack of stars... my sons were 8 and 10 when I got this for them and it was just too easy. I love disney, but this wasn't challenging enough to be fun.
customer_reviews.author: FieryNess

customer_reviews.title: Good quality family fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the whole family. The format is simple, even for preschool age to play. Seems to have more questions from newer Disney movies and tv shows.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I Am

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift for my family and they loved it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my family and they loved it
customer_reviews.author: J.Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Weekly game night
customer_reviews.text: This is part of our weekly game night line up.
customer_reviews.author: jcsm

customer_reviews.title: Great game for young teenagers
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved this game. He is 11 so is great for that age group
customer_reviews.author: STELLA

customer_reviews.title: It's fun and can be hard if you havent been to the parks
customer_reviews.text: Has questions about ANYTHING DISNEY/PIXAR. Can be challenging if you haven't been to the parks but its alot of fun and seems to be able to keep being replayed
customer_reviews.author: Kortney

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I play this game with our 5 year old and we all have fun. We had to change the way we play a bit because my son doesn't know how to read. GREAT game!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift. Fun game for all ages. It’s like a silly version of Disney trivial pursuit.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Disney edition
customer_reviews.text: So much fun if you are a Disney fan like we are! Great game for older kids and adults as well. Everyone that plays needs to know how to read.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle J.

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old really loved this game, and it was pretty entertaining for us as well. Some of the disney games can be a little mind numbing, but this is a sold 20 minutes of family fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for everyone, especially Disney lovers!
customer_reviews.text: My entire family plays this, including my 65 year old dad and my 5 year old daughter. We all love it. Perfect for any age and even if you don't know a ton of Disney trivia, its a fun game with several ways to play and interact. Very pleased. Good quality pieces and board.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: A promising game
customer_reviews.text: As with every trivia game, there are some questions that seem to come from out of nowhere and are almost impossible to answer and others that are so simple you wonder why they were included. But it is fun and fast moving for an evening's entertainment for virtually all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Old Sparkie

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids of all ages. They knew more about some of the buildings then me...
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a set of twin 9 year old girls who LOVE Harry Potter.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Talty

customer_reviews.title: Quick and fun game
customer_reviews.text: We love Disney in our family. For a Christmas present, this was right up our alley. Fun for family night.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer & John Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages.  Seriously, if you like Disney, you will love this game!
customer_reviews.text: I totally understimated this game! I thought it was just something cute that my 5 year old could get excited about. Actually, it is fun for the whole family. The gameplay is well thought out and while it has similarites to other trivia games, it is also very unique. My wife and I and our teanage son love playing this game. It is truly fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: D. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great family game!
customer_reviews.text: My girls who are 14 and 9 years old love this game. It had a ton of question cards to keep the game interesting. It very easy to understand the rules and also easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: LorrindaS83

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME family game
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME family game! We purchased this game to get our nieces and nephew ready for our December Disney trip. They had a lot of fun. We even had an adults only game during Thanksgiving!
customer_reviews.author: ZGMiller

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Kids love playing it. Good amount of questions both easy and hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard...
customer_reviews.text: this game is for teenagers + ... not even tweens. Rules are hard and confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Callee Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun game and easy to play
customer_reviews.text: Fun game! The whole family loves it. Very Fun for family fun night.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Better than the usual HP Trivia!
customer_reviews.text: My family has played ever HP Trivia. We were looking for something different. This game has pictures and adds a different twist. We absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: elizYEN

customer_reviews.title: We thought it would be a good nastilgic game about Disney
customer_reviews.text: Cute game, but definitely for the younger folk. We thought it would be a good nastilgic game about Disney. But the questions are definetly made for the young ones.
customer_reviews.author: samantha ten eyck

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Game for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Great family game. We have played it about 5 times since we got it. But I do think it has a bit of a limited shelf life for us. The questions are pretty easy to start out with, so we are learning all the cards quickly. But for the price, it is totally worth it. I love games where all my kids of all ages compete equally.
customer_reviews.author: vanv

customer_reviews.title: Great for family game night
customer_reviews.text: We love playing this as a family. Huge Disney fans! You can get through a game pretty quickly and it’s easy enough for my 6 year old to play without help.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeAddict

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: It was fun and I played it with Disney enthusiasts from ages 10 to 44.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Family classic with a Disney twist.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute game. Got this to play while on a Disney trip for a bachelorette party. Definitely added a bit of fun to these young at heart girls!!!
customer_reviews.author: cam

customer_reviews.title: Great game for the family, good Disney trivia
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game for the family, we have 4 daughters ages 3, 6, 8, & 10, they all love to play this game. Many times they will even play it by themselves, though the 3 year-old usually has to team up with one of the older kids. It has good Disney trivia, not too difficult or too easy to allow adults to have fun as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! Just got it and is an instant hit. Challenging enough for adults but easy enough for kids. Game play is great and easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Coles

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for Disney fans!
customer_reviews.text: My special needs daughter loves this game because it has pictures. Maybe a few too many directions and rules so we modified how we play. We can get through the game in about 30 minutes which is a plus also. Great questions on many different levels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: good family game for kids that like disney movies, but not overly fun or engaging
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Crockett

customer_reviews.title: The whole family loved this. At first we thought it was going ...
customer_reviews.text: The whole family loved this. At first we thought it was going to too easy for some of us, since we are big Disney fans, but some of the questions were definitely challenging. We adjusted a couple of the questions, so the youngest could play along. They could recognize the pictures, so they had fun too.
customer_reviews.author: CLP

customer_reviews.title: I was not expecting my daughter to love this game so much
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting my daughter to love this game so much! Some of the questions are really hard but she loves the images and making up her own rules on how to play.
customer_reviews.author: MadMike

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter was gifted this game one year and we enjoyed it as a family
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was gifted this game one year and we enjoyed it as a family. We purchased one for a family friend and they love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: 4loths

customer_reviews.title: Clinical use that kids love
customer_reviews.text: Use for therapy. Gets to see how they view things based on Disney characters. Kids don't realize I am using it clinically and they get to have fun!
customer_reviews.author: TracyAnn Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: my three daughters LOVED it.
customer_reviews.text: Played this game with my wife and kiddos... my three daughters LOVED it... it's fast paced but easy enough that everyone had a great time!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME for family game night!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Disney FANATIC and this game is SUPER fun! It has great questions for people of all levels of play-even my 3 year old enjoyed playing this as "teams" on family game night. The cards have fun, bright pictures, the game pieces are fun colors and shaped like Mickey's head. The game play takes about 30 minutes to play when you have 2 people and about 45 minutes when you have 4 people. The rules are easy to understand and out of the box, the game is ready to play in about 10 minutes. Overall, this is a great family game or fun for anyone who loves Disney trivia.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for whole fam!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game that is challenging for whole family...even self-proclaimed Disney buffs. A bit more complicated than necessary with the bidding system but my kids seem to enjoy that part too. Like that the group can work together to solve the questions.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Moran

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was going to be too easy of a game for adults
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was going to be too easy of a game for adults, but there are definitely some questions that will stump your average adult disney fan! Great game!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Mandigo

customer_reviews.title: FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: Just a fun game for anyone who loves Harry Potter!!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the game, but it's rules are a bit complicated .
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my nine year old and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nine year old and it was way too simple for her. It’s a cute game but for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loved It
customer_reviews.text: Grandson Loved It! We had a great time playing this with him!
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun game, but if you’re a true Potterhead like we are, it’s a little too easy. Good times either way!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got as a Christmas gift for our 5 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Got as a Christmas gift for our 5 year old daughter. The age limit starts at age 7, but she destroyed her mother and grandparents in a legitimate competition (we don't gift wrap victory in our family). If they have a knowledge of Disney movies, its age range can be anything.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Game - But Not For the Very Young
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game - but, maybe not for the very young. My grandson is 6 and just doesn't know the Disney movies well enough. A couple cousins, however, aged 9 and 13 did pretty well. I worked with the 6 year old against the two of them - and actually won a couple times!
customer_reviews.author: James M. Dykes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game! Anyone can play and you find yourself playing multiple rounds!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Vance

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun! We love playing either with our kids or their grandparents, everyone enjoys it
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for Disney Fans, even for just 2 players!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend who is a single mother with a 13 year old daughter. They love Disney and did not own this game. I picked it because they could play it with 2 people. She said it was a hit on Christmas day, they just kept playing it!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: I loved playing this game with my 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: As a big Disney fan, I loved playing this game with my 6 year old! There was some questions he wasn't familiar with but we have such a great time playing this game!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: They loved it. Mission accomplished
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday gift for a Disney fanatic. They loved it. Mission accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: Riddle0326Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister for Christmas and she absolutely loved it
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, great for entire family, good mix of the old and new movies.
customer_reviews.text: Fun game, already spent numerous hours playing with the entire family. This game is great for kids and adults alike. And, it has a great mix of the old movies and new...so just about anyone can plan and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fetner

product_meta.title: Pictopia-Family Trivia Game: Disney Edition
product_meta.description: Style:Disney PictopiaKids can discover playful trivia spanning decades of Disney magic, from animated classics and blockbuster movies, to television hits and dazzling theme park destinations. It's a game of teamwork--with a competitive twist! Along the way, are guess-my-answer questions that reveal how much kids know about the other players!
feature_bullets: What you get - pictopia Disney comes with 200 trivia cards, 6 answer cards, 30 wager cards, 1 game board, 6 movers, 1 die, and 1 instruction manual.
Fun play experience - you can play a game of trivia in 25 minutes, and it's perfect for 2-6 players ages 7 and up, Which makes this a perfect gift for families who love to play games together.
Easy to understand instructions - high quality, Easy to understand instructions make it possible to start playing right away.

Great replay value - pictopia is a trivia game with a unique twist - guess-my-answer questions reveal how much players know about each other, meaning the game can be played over and over with different answers.

Long term quality - Since its launch in 2007, Wonder Forge has consistently offered top-quality experiences, raising the bar for preschool and family games everywhere. The preschool titles celebrate the “can do” attitude in all kids - engaging them physically, socially, and creatively. The family games bridge generation gaps and create wholesome family moments and lasting memories.
